teststorydesc: After documenting vaccinations for Tyler Owen Banks the clinician, Lily Jackson (ID 456) recognizes that an error was made during data entry for the Hepatitis A vaccine. The Lot Number was entered incorrectly. She updates the data in the EHR and transmits it to the IIS.
preCondition: The IZ-AD-5.1_Send_V04_Z22 test step has been successfully completed.
testObjectives: Support for sending an update notification.
notes:
Lot number changed from 208940 in Test Case 5 to 208490 in Test Case 6.

For new administration messages, the vaccine is communicated using NDC codes in RXA-5 (Administered Code). For a given vaccine, one or more NDC codes may be appropriate to message. For this reason, RXA-5.1 is categorized as "Value - Test Case Fixed List" and allows for multiple valid values. The Message Content and Example Message data contain a single representative valid NDC code for example purposes.
